I don't do music.
Tried out various midi packages and neither are very good if you don't have a midi-compatible instrument.

I make no claim to be good at playing music... Seeing as I can't play any musical instrument at all... I think I could probably arrange the music quite well, or play jazz a bit (if I *could* play an instrument) though.

Posts.EditableText: My first impression Syco was: Cool title ruined by mediocre music.  I'm not saying you don't display talent.  It's just that the rhythm riff is a common sounding one (rehashed from the 70's and mid 80's).  The rhythm riff immediately made me want to blurt out... "This sounds like..." but I can't place it.  The solo obviously wasn't worked out to a finished product, but it's evident that you can move your fingers upon the fretboard and use a whammy bar.  I'll be listening forward for any other music you post.

Thanks for listening. As I've stated it's not a full tune or even meant to be. It was a quickly thrown together piece to join in the fun. The drum track doesn't even match up. LOL  It's not a true gage of my talent. But more of a hey I wanna join in the fun.. The solo was in part just warm up type exercises and fooling about. I don't have a whammy bar though. 

To be honest, this is the reason I haven't put my game out yet. It should be judged on it's merits as a finished product and it's not finished.
